parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host Address
parameter.description: IP address or host name and port

parameter.name: apikey
parameter.label: API Key
parameter.description: If no API Key is provided, a new one will be requested. You need to authorize the access on the deCONZ web interface.

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Sensor ID
parameter.description: The deCONZ bridge assigns an integer number ID to each sensor.
